commentAnnotations.text: The Screening Period may be extended up to a total of 90 days for extenuating circumstances, e.g., supply constraints.
As allowed by local regulations, subjects will receive the PKG-watch following Screening Visit 1 (V1) and will be required to wear it during the Monitoring Period.
Software version 'DL.v01.05' is installed on the pumps.
Subjects enrolled under protocol v6.0 (or after) will use the Neria Guard infusion set at the start of enrollment.

studyDefinitionDocumentVersions.description: Current version identified in page headers and Appendix B.
Historical version referenced in Table 9 footnotes regarding subject enrollment transitions.
